name: Brink (itch) (DleetSoft)
description:
If you like Pong and Break Out then you will love Brink. It takes 2 classics and mixes them into one fast paced Action Game. The goal is to keep the ball inbounds using both of your paddles, break the blocks, see how long you can last and beat the high score. 

But don't think this will be easy! Blocks randomly generate at certain times, giving you a randomly generated challenge! 

Number of Players: 1

Number of Levels: 1
